column5: http://www.mlive.com/outdoors/index.ssf/20...ward_to_la.html  This is in the Grand River in Michigan I guess the sturgeon didn't fit in the white bucket,  Pass this around to other msg boards if you can.  jjcanoe
He was caught and arrested last week.   BUSTED!!!!!
The latest news -  he was electrocuted 3 days ago.
This just in -  they plan on grinding him up and using him for chum!
Thats a funny looking net he has there
